title: About Me
body:
Shao Stassen
Senior at Cornell University studying Computer Science with a focus in Robotics
Here on campus I am doing foundation model and diffusion policy research on the assisitive robotic lab EmPRISE. I am also an Autonomous member of the Combat Robotics at Cornell Project Team. I will be updating my site through the semester to reflect my progress in Fast Robots - ECE4160.
